fields.description: During the build we're having many warning highlighting we're still using internally deprecated code. We must remove as much as we can to allow any code drop easily in the future and a clean CI.

comments.body: I'm assigning this one to myself. However, everybody is welcome to contribute as this is a long standing task.

At this moment, this is the distribution of the internal usage of deprecation (in parenthesis the number of occurrences):
